title: Kelly Bike Co TakeOff Drop Bar Shifter Mounts Are Back in Stock For Now
content:
Popularized in the 1990 through the early aughts and back in stock for now, Kelly Bike Co’s TakeOff™ shift lever mount adapters are a means to mount your existing down tube shift levers right beneath your brake levers (drop bars only) on your vintage road bike, touring bike, drop bar MTB, or cyclocross bike with access to the shifters from the three most important spots on your drop style handlebars: tops, drops, and brake hoods…

Unlike barcons, that can break when or if your bike falls over, the TakeOffs tuck your shifter inside your bars, away from harm. They are lightweight—140 grams per pair—versatile, easy to install, and, most of all, reliable! Compatible with: Shimano 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 speed, Campy, Suntour, Mavic, and many other reputable down tube shifters as well as Shimano, Suntour bar end shifters.

Construction: lightweight steel, tig welded, brazed, powder-coat silver finish.

Each pair includes:

  • 1 left and 1 right shift lever mount bracket
  • 2 stainless routing elbows
  • 2 double sided ferrules
  • 2 stainless M5 hex head bolts
  • 2 stainless washers

Free shipping anywhere in the continental USA!

See more at Kelly Bike Co.
